data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module let users get a series of web pages with common
    attributes and extract data with little effort. It also provides a
    small language for users to declare which page to retrieve and which
    page to extract. Users can use it to build a search engine client, a
    personal news agent, or a price comparison agent, etc.

    See WWW::ContentRetrieval for detail.
